content: this rustic pumpkin garland will have your home ready for fall in no time fast and easy to make these 2d style pumpkins two flat panels stuffed and joined together can be made into a garland arranged in a fall basket used as place setting decor or anything else you can dream up visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern pattern download - please note this listing is for the pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions and step-by-step pictures - this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file pdf upon purchase skill level easy -this pattern is beginner-friendly but does require some knowledge of basic stitches and pattern reading sizing each pumpkin measure about 3 75 x 3 and finished garland as written measures about 68 share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag @theknottednest and use the #rusticpumpkingarland hashtag to show off your new project copyright the rustic crochet pumpkin garland pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
